name: スカイガンナー
summary: Sky Gunner (often stylized as SkyGunner) is a 3D third-person combat flight simulator video game for the PlayStation 2. The game's setting and art style has elements of steampunk. It was developed by PixelArts and was released in Japan on September 27, 2001 by Sony Computer Entertainment. It was released to the North American market by Atlus USA on June 24, 2002.
info:
• 中文名: 天空炮手
  • 发行: Sony Interactive Entertainment
  • 制作人: 桐田富和
  • 别名: 空战神鹰
  • 别名: SkyGunner
  • 别名: Sky Gunner
  • 平台: PS2
  • 游戏类型: TPS / 飞行模拟
  • 游玩人数: 单人
